description: Discover the best hotels in Colorado, United States. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Colorado Award-Winning Viceroy Ski Resort in Aspen
hotels.description: Connect with the great outdoors and feel immediately uplifted and invigorated with a spectacular stay at Viceroy Snowmass, Colorado - a luxury resort at the base of one of the world’s most sought-after ski mountains, voted Best Ski Hotel in Colorado in the Travel + Leisure: World's Best Awards 2022 and Best Ski Hotel 2020 in the USA Today Readers' Choice Awards. Considered a laidback alternative to nearby, world-famous Aspen, Snowmass offers a more relaxed atmosphere for families and couples seeking a chilled-out escape. Majestic peaks and breathtaking powdery terrain frame the resort, with exceptional skiing and snowboarding trails on your doorstep. Sample the flavours of Colorado at the many dining options nearby or simply relax in the comfort of your cosy sanctuary after a full day exploring Mother Nature’s playground, with après-ski luxury including a dreamy spa, outdoor pools and sophisticated dining.

hotels.title: Luxurious Colorado Ski-In Ski-Out Escape on the Slopes of Mount Crested Butte
hotels.description: Elevation Hotel & Spa offers guests a beautiful year-round mountain slope-side experience in the Colorado Rockies - one of America's best ski destinations. This luxury ski-in, ski-out destination, located at the base of Mount Crested Butte and part of the Vail Epic Pass system, features slope-side dining, a full-service spa, a heated indoor pool, and three hot tubs, perfect for summers spent mountain biking and winters spent skiing and snowboarding.

hotels.title: Modern Colorado Rocky Mountain Retreat with Panoramic Views & Ski-In Ski-Out Access
hotels.description: Nestled among the picturesque San Juan Mountains, renowned for its seemingly endless terrain, this luxe lodging offers prime ski access for adventurers of all levels. Located in Mountain Village above downtown Telluride, just a short gondola ride away, this upscale ski-in ski-out paradise serves as your launchpad for the ultimate outdoor adventure all year round. In the winter months, carve your way through fresh powder before kicking off your apres-ski with a cocktail at The View Bar & Grill, or revel in glorious alpine views while relaxing in the outdoor hot tub. When you’re not on the slopes, you'll find a world of adventure awaits - from hiking or cycling along exhilarating trails, wandering through lush meadows or day tripping to Orvis Hot Springs, where you can soak up mountainside serenity.

hotels.title: Stylish Aspen Mountain All-Suite Retreat with Outdoor Pool, Hot Tub & Restaurant
hotels.description: Let the mesmerising natural surroundings wash over you with a stay at Aspen Meadows Resort, an all-suite retreat framed by Aspen Mountain and the lush Highlands. This Bauhaus-inspired escape offers opportunities to chase the rush or relaxation - spend your day speeding down the slopes, or ease tired muscles in the heated outdoor pool and hot tub. Take advantage of bicycle rentals in the summer to explore the Rio Grande trail, or tuck into locally sourced ingredients from Colorado's Rocky Mountains at West End Social.

hotels.title: Luxury Slopeside Escape in Colorado's Vail Village
hotels.description: Discover luxury on the renowned slopes of the Rocky Mountains with a stay at The Sebastian - Vail, a hotel perfectly positioned in the heart of Colorado’s Vail Village. Offering a ski-in, ski-out service and après ski activities aplenty - think pool, hot tubs, Bloom Spa and some of the village’s best charcuterie at Leonora restaurant - you'll be hard-pressed to find a place that better celebrates the magic of this storied mountain.

hotels.vendor_name: Madeline Hotel & Residences, Auberge Resorts Collection
hotels.title: Landmark Ski-In Ski-Out Colorado Luxury with Panoramic Mountain Views, Heated Pool & Onsite Spa
hotels.description: Snow-capped sophistication awaits at this ski-in ski-out alpine sanctuary in the heart of the breathtaking San Juan Mountains. Just minutes from Telluride's charming gold-mining town, surrounded by rugged forested highlands, this five-star retreat is the perfect place for both adrenaline-filled adventure and recharging in the natural world. When you’re not skiing the slopes, soak in the heated outdoor pool with misty steam, while enjoying panoramic mountain views. Sweat it out in the state-of-the-art fitness centre, reconnect with your body in a yoga class or relieve your muscles with a deep tissue massage at the serene day spa. In the evenings, cosy up by the crackling fireplace at the Timber Room bar, where you can enjoy expertly crafted cocktails and indulge in rustic dishes made with locally sourced produce at Black Iron Kitchen and Bar.
